kick.general: You kick the air and pull a muscle in your groin.
kick.self: You kicked yourself in the nuts! Good job!
kick.target: You kick %1 in the nuts. They squeal like a pig!

punch.general: You punch a nearby wall and shatter your knuckles.
punch.self: You punched your own lights out! That's talent!
punch.target: You punch %1 in the nose. Crack!

fap.general: You fap and get a blister.
fap.self: You fap and get a blister.

wave.general: You crash into the sandy shore.
wave.target: You wave at %1. They stare at you as if you're insane.

smile.self: You smile at yourself. Yourself smiles back.
smile.target: You smile at %1. They punch you in the face.
